layers.name: Total Productivity - S1
layers.description: Provides the growing season integral computed as the sum of all daily Plant Phenology Index values between the dates of the season start and end.

layers.name: Total Productivity - S2
layers.description: Provides the growing season integral computed as the sum of all daily Plant Phenology Index values between the dates of the season start and end.

layers.name: Seasonal Productivity - S1
layers.description: Provides the growing season integral computed as sum of all daily Plant Phenology Index values between the dates of the season start and end, minus their base level value.

layers.name: Seasonal Productivity - S2
layers.description: Provides the growing season integral computed as sum of all daily Plant Phenology Index values between the dates of the season start and end, minus their base level value.

layers.name: Season Length - S1
layers.description: Provides the number of days between the start and end dates of the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: Season Length - S2
layers.description: Provides the number of days between the start and end dates of the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: Season Amplitude - S1
layers.description: Provides the difference between the maximum and minimum Plant Phenology Index values reached during the season.

layers.name: Season Amplitude - S2
layers.description: Provides the difference between the maximum and minimum Plant Phenology Index values reached during the season.

layers.name: Slope of the Green-up Period - S1
layers.description: Provides the rate of change in the values of the Plant Phenology Index at the day when the vegetation growing season starts.

layers.name: Slope of the Green-up Period - S2
layers.description: Provides the rate of change in the values of the Plant Phenology Index at the day when the vegetation growing season starts.

layers.name: Slope of the Green-down Period - S1
layers.description: Provides the rate of change in the values of the Plant Phenology Index at the day when the vegetation growing season ends.

layers.name: Slope of the Green-down Period - S2
layers.description: Provides the rate of change in the values of the Plant Phenology Index at the day when the vegetation growing season ends.

layers.name: Start-of-season Date - S1
layers.description: Provides the date when the vegetation growing season starts in the time profile of the Plant Phenology Index.

layers.name: Start-of-season Date - S2
layers.description: Provides the date when the vegetation growing season starts in the time profile of the Plant Phenology Index.

layers.name: Season Maximum Date - S1
layers.description: Provides the date in the vegetation growing season when the maximum Plant Phenology Index value is reached.

layers.name: Season Maximum Date - S2
layers.description: Provides the date in the vegetation growing season when the maximum Plant Phenology Index value is reached.

layers.name: End-of-season Date - S1
layers.description: Provides the date when the vegetation growing season ends in the time profile of the Plant Phenology Index.

layers.name: End-of-season Date - S2
layers.description: Provides the date when the vegetation growing season ends in the time profile of the Plant Phenology Index.

layers.name: Start-of-season Value - S1
layers.description: Provides the value of the Plant Phenology Index at the start of the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: Start-of-season Value - S2
layers.description: Provides the value of the Plant Phenology Index at the start of the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: Season Maximum Value - S1
layers.description: Provides the maximum (peak) value that the Plant Phenology Index reaches during the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: Season Maximum Value - S2
layers.description: Provides the maximum (peak) value that the Plant Phenology Index reaches during the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: Season Minimum Value S1
layers.description: Provides the average Plant Phenology Index value of the minima on left and right sides of each season.

layers.name: Season Minimum Value S2
layers.description: Provides the growing season integral computed as sum of all daily Plant Phenology Index values between the dates of the season start and end, minus their base level value.

layers.name: End-of-season Value - S1
layers.description: Provides the value of the Plant Phenology Index at the end of the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: End-of-season Value - S2
layers.description: Provides the value of the Plant Phenology Index at the end of the vegetation growing season.

layers.name: Quality Flag - S1
layers.description: Indicates the quality of the global Vegetation Phenology and Productivity Parameters, in the form of a confidence level.

layers.name: Quality Flag - S2
layers.description: Indicates the quality of the global Vegetation Phenology and Productivity Parameters, in the form of a confidence level.
